officialTitle: Early Cognitive Function and Recovery in Elderly Patients After Laser Laryngeal Surgery: Desflurane-based vs Propofol-based Anesthesia
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients scheduled for laser laryngeal surgery under general anesthesia with either Propofol or desflurane based technique.
* Must have minimum age of 60 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Patients with cardiac, pulmonary, hepatic, or renal dysfunction, epilepsy, or uncontrolled hypertension, or those taking medications that influence the central nervous system, are excluded from the study. Patients who show obvious alteration of mental status, or refuse to participate, are also excluded from the study.
